title: The Bright Moon Entered My Dream - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Modern Day   Reverse R*pe
author: 江至疏
description:
Fu Rong had a dream in which she forced herself on Xue Heng.

Originally, she thought it was some kind of erot*c dream. But she didn’t expect to wake up and find that what happened in the dream had come true…

“I obviously wouldn’t dare to pluck the moon.”

“I want the moon to come running to me.”>
